ygData.subject: Re: Having problems... <sigh>
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry my message was so long, the basic thing is that I can t connect to EQ and we think it is because of the cable connection that we use. Our ISP is
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry my message was so long, the basic thing is
that I can't connect to EQ and we think it is because
of the cable connection that we use. Our ISP is
RoadRunner, they are unwilling to help us find the problem,
but we think we know the problem. We cannot connect
to EQ using our cable modem but we hooked up our old
phone modem and d/led AOL and now we CAN get back on.
So it must be something having to do with the cable
connection. Other people using cable and ethernet are also
having problems. Now we have to wait for someone to
figure out what the problem is, which could take days or
weeks, because the RoadRunner tech people are not
willing to listen to us or the EQ people telling them
there is a problem. 8(<br>-Khalista<br>Cleric of Tunare
